subject: Implement offline queue for SiYuan plugin
body: Implement the OfflineQueue for SiYuan plugin per docs/plans/2025-12-06-cross-app-sync-design.md Section 3. Location: .worktrees/siyuan/ies/plugin/src/lib/offlineQueue.ts. Same pattern as IES Reader - localStorage persistence, retry logic, max 50 ops. Integrate with siyuan-structure.ts saveJourney(). Add sync status indicator to Dashboard.
